document_data.name: Energy Buffer
document_data.mainbody: '''''Energy buffer''''' was a [[spell]] that protected a caster from [[elemental]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell protected a caster and their equipment from energy-based attacks used by [[elemental]]s. The spell absorbed damage from acid, cold, electricity, fire or sonic based spells. When an energy-based attack struck the caster, a multi-colored aura was visible around them. This spell was able to be used in conjunction with other elemental defense spells. The spell could only by cast on the caster.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
